publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6823Cathie Craigie:Big KIC Festival Motion—That the Parliament notes the Big KIC Festival which ran from 13 to 15 August 2010; congratulates the organisers for bringing together a fantastic range of local and international performers to Kilsyth for the weekend long festival; believes that the festival was a success and hopes it continues for years to come. Supported by: Bill Kidd*, Mary Mulligan*, Helen Eadie*, Elaine Smith*, Hugh O’Donnell*, Jackie Baillie*, James Kelly*, Bill Butler*, Karen Whitefield*, David Stewart*, Jamie Hepburn*, Gil Paterson*, Hugh Henry*
